metadata.title: Bienvenido a la Iglesia Nazarena Gracia de Dioz | Gracia de Dios
metadata.description: Bienvenido a Gracia de Dios - una vibrante comunidad de creyentes dedicados a esparcir el amor y la gracia de Jesucrist. Acompananos en nuestro viaje, donde buscamos crecer en la fe, esperanza y amor.

calloutOne.copy: Servicio de Adoracion: todos los domingos a las 3:00pm

sectionWelcome.header: Bienvenido a la Iglesia Nazarena Gracia de Dios
sectionWelcome.copyOne:
La Iglesia Nazarena Gracia de Dios es una comunidad de cristianos quienes proviniendo de varios países, diferentes trasfondos culturales, sociales y religiosos, nos congregamos para adorar y servir a Dios en la ciudad de Toronto, Canadá.

Ya seas nuevo en la fe o hayas sido un miebro de la Iglesia del Nazareno por anos, te damos la mas calida bienvenida. Es un privilegio conectarnos con personas que comparten una pasion por servir a Dios y esparcir su amor por todo el mundo.

ctaOne.copy: Conocenos - quienes somos y que representamos!

ctaTwo.copy: Descrube nuestra fe - la fundacion de lo que hacemos y en que creemos

ctaThree.copy: Descubre pepitas doradas de fe y sabiduria - un articulo a la vez

metadata.title: About us - Sharing God's Love with the World | Gracia de Dios
metadata.description: Learn about Grace of God - who we are, our values, our history, and our mission to spread the love of Jesus Christ to the world.

hero.verse: No te des prisa en hablar, ni se apresure tu corazón a proferir palabra delante de Dios. Porque Dios está en el cielo y tú en la tierra; por tanto sean pocas tus palabras.

sectionAbout.copy:
La Iglesia del Nazareno de la Gracia de Dios es una comunidad vibrante de creyentes dedicados a compartir el amor y la gracia de Jesucristo con el mundo. Nuestra iglesia está comprometida con la formación de discípulos que viven el mensaje del evangelio en sus vidas diarias. Creemos que la fe cristiana no solo es una cuestión personal, sino también comunitaria, y buscamos fomentar una comunidad amorosa y de apoyo donde todos puedan crecer en su relación con Dios

Nos esforzamos por ser una iglesia acogedora y abierta a todos, sin importar su pasado, su presente o sus circunstancias actuales. Queremos ser una fuente de esperanza y ayuda para aquellos que están en necesidad, y buscamos servir a nuestra comunidad en cualquier forma que podamos.

Nos encantaría que te unas a nosotros mientras buscamos crecer en nuestra fe, ayudar a otros y compartir el amor de Jesucristo con el mundo.

calloutBeliefs.copy: Nuestras creencias tambien forman parte de quienes somos

sectionMission.copy:
La misión de la Iglesia del Nazareno es hacer discípulos en las naciones.

Somos una comunidad global de fe, se nos ha comisionado llevar las buenas nuevas de vida en Cristo Jesús a gente en todas partes y diseminar el mensaje bíblico de la santidad (vivir a la semejanza de Cristo) en todos los países.

sectionValues.copy: Creemos que la santidad es la virtud principal de todo buen Nazareno.

values.valueOne: Somos un pueblo cristiano al servicio de la comunidad
values.valueTwo: Alabamos a Jesucristo y lo confesamos como Senor
values.valueThree: Somo un pueblo de santidad como estilo de vida
values.valueFour: Somos un pueblo misional, evangelizamos con compasion

profiles.name: Gina Torres
profiles.motto: Con Dios podemos alcanzarlo todo y mucho más de lo que imaginamos. Con Dios podemos hacer realidad todos nuestros sueños.

profiles.name: Oswaldo Castellanos
profiles.motto: A veces las cosas no salen como tu esperabas, porque lo que te espera es lo mejor de Dios!DIOS quita pero cuando devuelve, MULTIPLICA...

profiles.name: Roxana Contreras
profiles.motto: La Fe en Dios no hace las cosas fáciles, pero si las hace posibles...No te aferres a cosas pequeñas porque DIOS tiene algo más grande para ti.

profiles.name: Francisco Buitrago
profiles.motto: Donde hay fe hay amor, donde hay amor hay paz, donde hay paz esta DIOS y donde está DIOS no falta nada. Es mejor tenerlo a El.

sectionMinistries.copy: Grace of God has a variety of groups that cater to different age groups, interests, and needs, providing opportunities for spiritual growth, fellowship, and service.

metadata.title: Welcome to Grace of God Nazare Church | Grace of God
metadata.description: Welcome to Grace of God - a vibrant community of believers dedicated to spreading the love and grace of Jesus Christ. Join us as we journey together, seeking to grow in faith, hope, and love.

sectionWelcome.header: Welcome Grace of God Nazarene Church
sectionWelcome.copyOne:
Grace of God Nazarene Church is a community of Christians who coming from various countries, different cultural, social and religious backgrounds, gather to worship and serve God in the city of Toronto, Canada.

Whether you are new in the faith or have been a member of the Church of the Nazarene for many years, we want to extend a warm welcome to you. It is a privilege to connect with individuals who share a passion for serving God and spreading his love in the world.

ctaOne.copy: Get to know us - who we are and what we stand for!

ctaTwo.copy: Discover our faith - the foundation of all we do and believe in.

ctaThree.copy: Uncover golden nuggets of faith and wisdom - one post at a time

metadata.title: About us - Sharing God's Love with the World | Grace of God
metadata.description: Learn about Grace of God - who we are, our values, our history, and our mission to spread the love of Jesus Christ to the world.

hero.verse: No te des prisa en hablar, ni se apresure tu corazón a proferir palabra delante de Dios. Porque Dios está en el cielo y tú en la tierra; por tanto sean pocas tus palabras.

sectionAbout.copy:
Grace of God Nazarene Church is a vibrant community of believers dedicated to sharing the love and grace of Jesus Christ with the world. Our church is committed to forming disciples who live out the message of the gospel in their daily lives. We believe that the Christian faith is not just a personal matter, but also a community one, and we seek to foster a loving and supportive community where everyone can grow in their relationship with God.

We strive to be a welcoming and open church to all, regardless of their past, present, or current circumstances. We want to be a source of hope and help for those in need, and we seek to serve our community in any way we can.

We would love for you to join us as we seek to grow in our faith, help others, and share the love of Jesus Christ with the world.

calloutBeliefs.copy: Nuestras creencias tambien forman parte de quienes somos

metadata.title: Our Beliefs - Sharing God's Love with the World | Grace of God Nazarene Church
metadata.description: Learn about the beliefs of the Grace of God Nazarene Church: discover our emphasis on holiness, commitment to evangelism and missions, and belief in sanctification, divine healing, and the second coming of Jesus.

hero.verse: No te des prisa en hablar, ni se apresure tu corazón a proferir palabra delante de Dios. Porque Dios está en el cielo y tú en la tierra; por tanto sean pocas tus palabras.

sectionExplore.copy: Learn about the beliefs of the Grace of God Nazarene Church, a Protestant Christian denomination with roots in the Wesleyan-Holiness tradition. Discover Our emphasis on holiness, commitment to evangelism and missions, and belief in sanctification, divine healing, and the second coming of Jesus. Explore our values of education, worship, and family, and understand our connectional system of church government.

sectionArticles.copy: The Articles of Faith represent our fundamental beliefs. They serve as a statement of faith and provide a framework for understanding our denomination's theological perspective and practice. They serve as a unifying declaration of what we believe and are the foundation for our ministry and mission.

accordions.panel: We believe in one God, who exists in three persons - the Father, the Son (Jesus Christ), and the Holy Spirit.
We believe in the divinity of Jesus Christ, his virgin birth, sinless life, atoning death, bodily resurrection, and ascension to heaven.
We believe in the Holy Spirit, who is a person and is part of the triune God. The Holy Spirit empowers believers to live a holy life and to bear witness to Christ.
The Church of the Nazarene believes in the authority and inspiration of the Bible, which is the written word of God. The Bible is the final authority for all matters of faith and practice.

We believe that sin entered the world through Adam and Eve's disobedience, and that all human beings are born with a sin nature. We also believe that individuals commit personal sins and need forgiveness and salvation.
We believe that Jesus Christ's death on the cross provides the only means of salvation for humanity. Through his death and resurrection, believers are reconciled to God and receive eternal life.
We believe in prevenient grace, which is the grace of God that goes before us, preparing our hearts to receive salvation.
We believe that repentance is necessary for salvation. Repentance involves a genuine turning away from sin and a turning toward God.

We believe that justification is the act of God declaring a sinner righteous based on faith in Christ. Regeneration is the new birth that occurs when a person accepts Christ as Lord and Savior. Adoption is the act of God receiving believers into His family.
We believe in the possibility of entire sanctification, which is a second work of grace that results in a believer being filled with the Holy Spirit and experiencing a life of victory over sin.

We believe in the universal Church, which is made up of all believers in Christ. We also believe in the local church, which is a community of believers who gather for worship, fellowship, and service.
We practice baptism by immersion for believers. Baptism is an outward symbol of an inward commitment to follow Christ.
We practice the Lord's Supper as a memorial of Christ's death and as a means of grace for believers.
We believe that God can and does heal people physically, emotionally, and spiritually.
We believe in the imminent return of Christ, when he will judge the living and the dead and establish his kingdom on earth.

We believe that all believers are called to be good stewards of the resources that God has entrusted to them. This includes their time, talents, and material possessions, which should be used to further God's kingdom and bless others.

calloutVisit.copy: Do you want to know more? Visit us during our Sunday Service and chat with one of our leaders

sectionCharacteristics.copy: These defining characteristics of the Church of the Nazarene and its members shape the church's identity and mission and provide a framework for its theology and practice.

accordions.panel: We are part of the Wesleyan-Holiness tradition, which emphasizes the biblical teachings of John Wesley, the founder of Methodism, and the Holiness movement, which emphasized the importance of a life of sanctification and purity.

accordions.trigger: Emphasis on Personal and Social Holiness
accordions.panel: We place a strong emphasis on both personal and social holiness. Personal holiness involves living a life that is set apart for God and characterized by obedience to God's commands. Social holiness involves engaging in compassionate ministry and social justice to help those in need.
We have a strong commitment to evangelism and missions, seeking to share the gospel of Jesus Christ with the world and to engage in compassionate ministry to those in need.

We place a high value on education, with several universities and seminaries around the world. We believes in the importance of equipping our members with knowledge and skills to serve God effectively.

We emphasize the importance of active participation in worship, including singing, prayer, scripture reading, and preaching. The church believes that worship is a vital part of a believer's spiritual growth and development.
We place a high value on traditional family values, including the importance of marriage between one man and one woman and the sanctity of human life.

calloutBlog.copy: You might also be interested in reading words from the hearts of our congreation

sectionValues.copy: These values help shape the identity and mission of the Grace of God Nazarene Chuch and guide us in living out our faith.

accordions.panel: As a Christian denomination, we value the centrality of Jesus Christ in all aspects of our theology, worship, and mission.
We value the biblical concept of holiness, which emphasizes the transformational work of the Holy Spirit in a believer's life, leading to a life of obedience and love for God and others.
We value the call to share the gospel of Jesus Christ with the world and to engage in compassionate ministry to those in need.
We value the importance of spiritual disciplines, such as prayer, fasting, Bible study, and accountability, in order to grow in faith and holiness.
We value the diversity of cultures, races, genders, and backgrounds within its membership and seeks to promote unity in Christ.
We value showing the love of Christ to others through acts of kindness, mercy, and justice.
We value innovation and creativity in order to effectively engage with the world and share the gospel.

calloutMessage.copy: Do you have any comments or questions?
